column4: Hi is there a reason why games don't work on vbox or am I doing something wrong?
what games? vbox dosent really do '3d video' very well.
Hi its neohasreturned from yesterday you ok? Well I tried cue club in the past and I wanted to run american mcgees alice?
i doubt if any 3d games will work well in vmware or virtualbox.    Why dont you try them in wine.
But I thought when you install xp in vbox it users drivers from the installation?
virtualbox emulates a video card..
theres some 3d support in vbox.. but its limited to special cases i belive
Oh I see wine is very hard to configure to get things working?
ive rarely had issues with wine.. see the wine app database.
What is front end without sounding thick lol
Oh ok is playonlinus any good for gaming then?
its a fancy front end to wine.. it does the same games that wine can do.
PlayOnLinux = is designed to play games on linux in wine...
Fair enough lol I will give it a bash lol
I will let you know my findings lol
means very little to me :) i got a windows box to play games on.
For some reason my laptop don't like dual booting
I love american mcgees alice and cue club only problem lol
I have installed playonlinux its wine?
playonlinux USES wine...   its a front end to wine...
Do you know how to install games on it?
you can proberly just copy the installed game from your windows drive to your users home dir.. and use wine directly
I dont use PlayOnlinux. check its help docs.
thanks anyway
